prodNameC: 倍利爾樂分枝桿菌培養系統(滅菌)
ingredientsDesc: BacT/ALERT MP-The media formulation consists of :Middlebrook 7H9 Broth,Pancreatic Digest of Casein,BSA,Catalase in purified water.\nMB-BacT Antibiotic Supplement-Lyophilized supplement formulated to contain Amphotericin B,Azolcilin,Nalidixic Acid,Polymyxin B,Trimethoprim,Vancomycin, and a bulking agent prior to processing.\nMB/BacT Reconstitution Fluid-Oleic acid,Glycerol,Amaranth,and BSA in purified water.

efficacy: 檢測和分離非血液的無菌體液樣本和消化、去污染的臨床樣品中的分枝桿菌。
